title: Information Literacy Through Art: Collaborative Project-Based Simulation Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A program where learners with office/administrative work experience develop integrated information literacy and artistic expression skills in simulations mirroring real work environments

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate reliable information sources with 80% accuracy in the art creation process using VR simulations.
Learners can convert information into visual/artistic formats and present it through a 4-member collaborative project.
Learners can systematically document the process from information collection to creative expression using an LMS in a digital portfolio
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
